org.conqat.engine.service.shared.client

Class ServiceClientUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.engine.service.shared.client.ServiceClientUtils

  • public class ServiceClientUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for IdeServiceClient.

      • createOptionString

        public static java.lang.String createOptionString(java.lang.String... parametersAndValues)
        Creates an encoded URL options string starting with ? from the given options. The given parameters are interpreted as parameter names and values, where each odd numbered parameter is a parameter name and each even one is the corresponding value.

      • createOptionString

        public static java.lang.String createOptionString(ListMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options)
        Creates an encoded URL options string starting with ? from the given options.
